thread.section_title: Tailor4Less Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tailor4Less | tailor4less.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Fabrics are good quality although there could be more options. Tailor fit clothes fit, but there could be even more measurements so the products would fit better on "unbalanced" body (for example huge back, normal chest) like I have. However, I would think that the suits tailored will fit to normal and balanced body perfectly. All the measurements were precise and accurate like I informed on the measurement page (no too loose or too tight parts in the product). I would recommend to a friend.
